content.question: What do the features on a Bundu mask embody?

choices.label: Ideals of masculine virtue, prowess, and power
Ideals of feminine beauty, morality, and conduct
Fertility and the first ancestral couple
The sacred presence of a deceased loved one

content.answer: Ideals of feminine beauty, morality, and conduct

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
